predicate.note: Frames file for 'associate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry amalgamate-22.3, 22.5; other framed members include incorporate. Comparison with 'include'

roleset.name: include in some group

role.descr: agent, entity causing some grouping, making an association
theme, thing being included in some group

example.name: typical, semi-prepositional usage
example.text: Dan E. Nelms, Valley Federal's president and chief executive officer, said the one-time charge substantially eliminates future losses associated *trace* with the unit .

roleset.note: The trace is rarely included in the automatic tagging (but should always be); occasionally treebank fails to put the tag in at all.

example.name: made-up agentive
example.text: John associates the smell of roofing tar with his mother's cooking.

roleset.note: I honestly have no idea where I get these examples from.
